member.name: M:DuetAPIClient.CommandException.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.param: Name of the command that failed

member.name: M:DuetAPIClient.CommandException.MakeException(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates an exception from the given type and message

member.name: T:DuetAPIClient.Connection
member.summary: Interface class for simple access to the control server via the Duet API using a UNIX socket

member.name: M:DuetAPIClient.Connection.#ctor(DuetAPI.Connection.ConnectionType)
member.summary: Create a new connection instance Desired mode of the connection

member.name: M:DuetAPIClient.Connection.Connect(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Establishes a connection to the given UNIX socket file
member.param: Path to the UNIX socket file

member.name: P:DuetAPIClient.Connection.IsConnected
member.summary: Returns true if the socket is still connected

member.name: M:DuetAPIClient.Connection.Close
member.summary: Closes the current connection and disposes it

member.name: M:DuetAPIClient.Connection.Dispose
member.summary: Cleans up the current connection and all resources associated to it

member.name: M:DuetAPIClient.Connection.Flush
member.summary: Instructs the control server to flush all pending commands and to finish all pending moves (like M400 in RepRapFirmware)

member.name: M:DuetAPIClient.Connection.GetFileInfo(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a G-code file and returns file information about it

member.name: M:DuetAPIClient.Connection.GetMachineModel(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Retrieves the full object model of the machine In subscription mode this is the first command that has to be called once a connection has been established.

member.name: M:DuetAPIClient.Connection.PerformCode(DuetAPI.Commands.Code)
member.returns: The result of the given code

member.name: M:DuetAPIClient.Connection.PerformSimpleCode(System.String)
member.summary: Executes an arbitrary G/M/T-code in text form and returns the result as a string
member.returns: The code result as a string

member.name: M:DuetAPIClient.Connection.ReceiveCode(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Wait for a code to be intercepted
member.returns: A code that can be intercepted

member.name: M:DuetAPIClient.Connection.ResolvePath(System.String)
member.summary: Resolve a RepRapFirmware-style file path to a real file path

member.name: M:DuetAPIClient.Connection.IgnoreCode
member.summary: Instruct the control server to ignore the last received code (in intercepting mode)

member.name: M:DuetAPIClient.Connection.ResolveCode(DuetAPI.MessageType,System.String)
member.summary: Instruct the control server to resolve the last received code with the given message details (in intercepting mode)

member.name: M:DuetAPIClient.Connection.GetMachineModelPatch(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Receive a (partial) machine model update. If the subscription mode is set to , new update patches of the object model need to be applied manually. This method is intended to receive such fragments.
